articles.title: Greetings to President of Seychelles
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Seychelles
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a congratulatory message to James Alix Michel upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Seychelles.
					 The message expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president of Seychelles success in his responsible work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Held
articles.content:
3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under KPA Held
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The 3rd Meeting of Activists in Fisheries under the Korean People's Army (KPA) took place here on Monday.
					 Present at the meeting were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik and other commanding officers of the KPA, officials of fisheries under the KPA, exemplary captains and fishermen under the KPA.
					
					 A letter of thanks of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea was conveyed to the officials and employees in the fisheries under the KPA.
					
					 The letter of thanks referred to the fact that the KPA hit the goal of hauling more than 50,000 tons of fishes through an intensive winter fishing campaign and registered spectacular successes in fish hauls, one of the famous sceneries of Songun era in the East Sea of Korea. This is ascribable to the loyalty and heroic devotion of the fishermen under the KPA who are determined to carry out the order of the Supreme Commander to land the projected quantities of fishes under whatever unfavorable conditions, the letter noted, and went on:
					
					 This shining success made in the fishing operations in the East Sea is another auspicious event that demonstrates the might of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army true to the leadership of the great party and the national power of the country which brings earlier rosy future with dynamism.
					
					 The officials and employees in the fisheries under the KPA are the heroes and passionate patriots devotedly supporting the Party Central Committee and their signal labor feats will record a new shining page in the history of the Korean people's revolutionary struggle and the country.
					
					 Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, in a report called for deeply trusting and following Marshal Kim Jong Un with intense loyalty and pure conscience and sense of obligation even in any storm and stress and devotedly supporting the Party Central Committee headed by Kim Jong Un with more spectacular successes in fishing operations.
					
					 He underscored the need to work harder to make a huge fish haul next year which will greet the 7th Congress of the WPK by courageously weathering out stormy waves in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu under the leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 His report was followed by speeches.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Ibrahim Abu Mualik, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Palestinian embassy here, conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Monday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 They were handed over to an official concerned by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the corps on Monday.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visit Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visit Mangyongdae Revolutionary School
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) ? The military attaches corps here visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary School on Monday on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 Members of the corps laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They went round the gymnasium of the school and shot live bullets at firing range.
					
					 Vietnamese Military Attache Nguyen Quoc Viet said the visit helped him to know better about the fact that Kim Jong Un has shown loving care and solicitude for the children of the school.   
					
					 Cuban Military Attache Roman O. Jimenez Ortega hoped that the children who are reliably carrying forward the Korean revolution would grow up to be core backbones of the People's Army in the drive to defend socialist Korea in the future.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated by Youths
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Celebrated by Youths
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the youth and students at the Central Youth Hall on Monday to celebrate the fourth anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 At the meeting a report was made by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme post of the revolutionary armed forces was the great honor and fortune of the nation of the sun and a historic event reliably guaranteeing the inheritance and accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They referred to the fact that Kim Jong Un made sure that the youth league could successfully fulfill its mission and duty as the organization of the youth going by the august name of the great sun and put forward the youth as the heroes of the youth power and creator of the legendary tale about heroic youth and the Songun youth culture.
					
					 They expressed their determination to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with high political enthusiasm and signal labor successes, faithfully upholding the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Supreme Commandership of KPA Observed
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the Central Youth Hall Monday to celebrate the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The performance began with small chorus "Let's Support Our Supreme Commander with Arms". Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as serial songs "Song of Airman" and "Song of Coastal Artillery Women".
					
					 The performers truthfully represented the boundless trust and reverence of the young vanguard for Kim Jong Un who has glorified the Songun revolutionary ideas and feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and led the great cause of Paektu to victory. 
					
					 The performance ended with chorus poem and small chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives". It fully reflected the iron will of the five million members of the young vanguard to exalt their honor of being the first-line death-defying corps in defending the leader, vanguard and shock brigade in building a thriving nation, true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador to DPRK Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Monday on the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Plastic Pipes Widely Used in Construction
articles.content:
Plastic Pipes Widely Used in Construction
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Plastic products have been used in many construction projects in the DPRK. Among them are plastic pipes of different kinds and sizes.
					 They are highly resistant to acids and alkalis, and external shock, easy in application and longer than drawn pipes in their serviceable life.
					
					 They were already used in the construction of Mirim Riding Club, Wisong Scientists Dwelling District, the May Day Stadium and the Meari Shooting Gallery.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Removal of Concrete Wall Dividing Korea into Two Parts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Removal of Concrete Wall Dividing Korea into Two Parts
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- There is nowhere else in the world such high barrier as concrete wall dividing the Korean Peninsula into two parts, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The world people are of the view that the peninsula is inhabited by the homogeneous nation rare to be found in any other part of the earth. It is the greatest tragedy in the history of the nation and a shame on it for Korea to remain partitioned.
					
					 The concrete wall was built as a symbol of division and showdown on the peninsula. This was a product of the U.S. crafty scenario against reunification, its heinous plot to create "two Koreas" and the despicable acts of treachery perpetrated by the south Korean military dictators, pursuant to its line. 
					
					 The military demarcation line and the concrete wall extending in the area south of it are cancer-like barriers physically blocking the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and hamstringing the efforts to achieve peace and reunification. 
					
					 The situation on the peninsula is inching close to the worst phase owing to the U.S. persistent moves to preserve the defunct armistice agreement (AA.)
					
					 It is the political barrier standing in the way of improving the DPRK-U.S. and north-south relations and achieving peace and reunification of the peninsula. And the military demarcation line and concrete wall are the physical barriers blocking the solution of the urgent issues of the nation.
					
					 If the AA is replaced with a peace treaty as urged by the DPRK and the military demarcation line and concrete wall are removed, the demilitarized zone, the forefront of the north-south confrontation, will turn into a peace zone and a bright prospect be opened for visits, exchange and economic cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely want peace and reconciliation between the north and the south, they should pull down the concrete wall, to begin with.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Cover Up Its True Colors as Cruel Murderer: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Cover Up Its True Colors as Cruel Murderer: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korea-U.S. joint working team recently released a report on the results of the survey made of the introduction of anthrax germs by the U.S. troops.
					 According to the report, the U.S. had conducted over 10 anthrax tests in its military bases in Ryongsan and Osan of south Korea from 2009 to 2014.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. is an empire of devils keen to turn the Korean Peninsula not only into the region exposed to nuclear radioactivity but shambles of germ warfare.
					
					 It is not the first time that the U.S. criminal scenario to exterminate the Korean nation was brought to light.
					
					 The U.S. committed unprecedented massacres by using even bacteriological weapons and poisonous chemical weapons during the last Korean War in wanton breach of international law and regulations. It also attempted to use nuclear weapons to exterminate the Korean nation. 
					
					 The U.S. regards bio-chemical weapons as main means for killing other nations and bio-chemical war as one of its main military operations to dominate the world.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. is playing a petty trick to justify its criminal scenario while talking about the non-existent "threat" from the north.
					
					 The "threat of weapons of mass destruction" and "bio-chemical threat" touted by it are no more than pretexts for putting pressure upon sovereign states, slapping international sanctions against them and securing justifications for military invasion.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. cover up its true colors as a gang of robbers threatening the existence of mankind and the most ferocious murderer defying international law.

articles.title: KCTU Condemns Police's Suppression
articles.content:
KCTU Condemns Police's Suppression
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) held a press conference outside the Police Agency on Dec. 24 in protest against the police's suppression, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Speakers said that a whirlwind of suppression is raging under the pretext of security as evidenced by the arrest of the chairman of the organization and issue of arrest warrants for the mere reason that they staged an all-out people's action.
					
					 They demanded the authorities ensure the freedom of rally and demonstration of the people and stop at once the suppression of the KCTU. 
					
					 A press release was read out.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Moving to Enact "Law on Human Rights in North"
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Dec. 24 to denounce the authorities for moving to enact the "law on human rights in the north", according to Jaju Sibo, an internet newspaper of south Korea.
					 Speakers said that the above-said law is an evil law fostering confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, prompted by the ambition of the authorities to realize the "unification of social systems" by "bringing down" the north.
					
					 They demanded the regime stop the fabrication of the law and work hard to improve inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "To Protect National Heritage Is a Patriotic Undertaking for Adding Brilliance to the History and Traditions of Our Nation" was published in booklet by Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia on Dec. 22.
					 The work, published on Oct. 24, Juche 103 (2014), deals with the fact that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il attached importance to the protection of national heritage and directed efforts to it in the whole course of leading the revolution, thus demonstrating the time-honored history and glorious culture of the Korean nation before the world.
					
					 It clarifies the tasks to be fulfilled to preserve the undying exploits of the great leaders and add luster to the history and tradition of the Korean nation by thoroughly implementing the policy of protecting the national heritage set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Ecuador, Angola and Mali on the occasion of the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise between Dec. 10 and 15 under the sponsorship of the remembrance committees.
					 Present there were personages of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the Canar Provincial Institute for Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK of Ecuador, the Cuenca City Hall of Ecuador, the Angolan Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, the Angolan newspaper Eme, the Angolan Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples and Progres School of Mali and masses.
					
					 Trotsky Serano, secretary general of the Ecuadorian Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il was a great leader, outstanding statesman and genuine revolutionary of the 21st century recognized by the whole world and most profoundly revered by the progressives.
					
					 The chairman of the Angolan Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il said that his exploits would be remembered not only by the Korean people but also by the world progressives.
					
					 The principal of Progres School of Mali noted that he led the Korean people to victory by his unique political mode, endowed with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Political Parties
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Introduced by Foreign Political Parties
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Organs and homepages of foreign political parties dedicated special write-ups to the fourth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The December issue of Line of March, organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said in an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il that the exploits he  performed by devoting himself to the country and its people all his life were recorded in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The December issue of Rote Fahne, organ of the Communist Party of Germany, carried an article titled "Life dedicated to future" illustrated with a portrait of his beaming image.
					
					 The article said that he regarded it as his lifetime goal and motto to devote his all to the future of the country and its people, adding:
					
					 His noble image will always be remembered by the Korean people and world progressives.
					
					 The Pervomaisk District Committee of Vitebsk City of the Communist Party of Belarus posted on its website an article on Dec. 15.
					
					 The article introduced his ideological and theoretical feats and leadership exploits, saying that he was a great statesman who performed titanic feats for accomplishing the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Dec. 15 on the occasion of the 4th anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is the iron-willed commander, identical to President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 His assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA marked a historic event that guaranteed the victorious advance of the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the DPRK is making a long drive, demonstrating its dignity as the political and ideological power and military one.
					
					 His holding the top posts of the party, state and army promises the bright future of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) - The 98th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk was observed in Mongolia and Bangladesh on Dec. 20 and 22.
					 A photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk was prominently displayed at the venue of a meeting held at Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Ulan Bator.
					
					 A. Narangerel, director of the kindergarten, underscored the need to improve the management and operation of the kindergarten going by the august name of Kim Jong Suk and make a positive contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 A lecture given at the Bangladeshi paper The Daily Folk under the sponsorship of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy was attended by over 100 people including the members of the group, workers, teachers and students.
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the group, said that Kim Jong Suk performed the greatest feats by protecting Kim Il Sung in battlefields of the anti-Japanese war at the risk of her life, adding:
					
					 She is always remembered by the Korean people as the incarnation of defending the leader unto death.
					
					 At the end of the lecture its participants watched Korean film "Arms of Korea."

articles.title: Book "Defending Songun" Printed in Britain
articles.content:
Book "Defending Songun" Printed in Britain
 Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of releasing book "Defending Songun" was brought out in the UK.
					 The book consists of subtitles of "On Songun idea", "Songun and class", etc.
					
					A book-releasing ceremony took place at the building of the New Communist Party of Britain on December 22.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages and members from the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the Korean Friendship Association UK.
					
					 Dermot Hudson, writer of the book and chairman of the Korean Friendship Association UK, said that he decided to write a book introducing the validity and vitality of the Songun idea that impressed him while visiting the DPRK several times.
					
					 Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, said that the DPRK is standing firm against the moves of the U.S. imperialists for a war of aggression, adding that this would be unthinkable without the tremendous capabilities for national defence bolstered up by the great leader Kim Jong Il by dint of the Songun politics. He went on:
					
					 The emergence of the DPRK, not a big country, as a world military power clearly demonstrates the invincible vitality and validity of the Songun idea.
					
					 The Songun idea serves as a banner of the anti-imperialist struggle to be held aloft by all progressives of the world as guidelines.
					
					 Revolutionaries of Britain extend full support to the Songun idea and Songun line of the DPRK.

articles.title: Efectuada III Reunion de Activistas de la Rama Pesquera de EPC
articles.content:
Efectuada III Reunion de Activistas de la Rama Pesquera de EPC
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en esta capital la III Reunion de Activistas de la Rama Pesquera del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, los miembros de mando del EPC, funcionarios, ejemplares capitanes y pescadores de la rama pesquera del EPC.
					
					En la reunion se transmitio un mensaje de agradecimiento remitido por el Comite Central y Comision Militar Central, del PTC a los funcionarios y pescadores del dominio pesquero del EPC.
					
					La misiva senala que el EPC capturo mas de 50 mil toneladas de pescados en el periodo de la campana invernal de captura concentrada y creo otro "panorama peculiar de pescados" de la epoca de Songun en el Mar Este. 
					
					Subraya que tales exitos devienen el orgulloso resultado logrado por la fidelidad y abnegacion heroica de los pescadores del EPC, quienes cumplen a toda costa la orden del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Puntualiza que tambien constituyen otro gran jubilo que ostenta el poderio estatal de la patria que adelanta el futuro radiante con el poderio y temperamento del potente ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, que es infinitamente fiel a la direccion del gran Partido.
					
					Elogia que los funcionarios y pescadores de la rama pesquera del EPC son heroes y combatientes patrioticos de la campana de defensa a ultranza del CC del Partido, y agrega que sus meritos laborales escribiran una pagina brillante en la historia de la lucha revolucionaria del pueblo coreano y los anales de la patria.
					
					En su informe, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Pak Yong Sik, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, exhorto a confiar y seguir con firmeza al Mariscal teniendo la fidelidad, la conciencia y la obligacion en cualesquier tempestades y a defender con grandes exitos de pesca el CC del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Llamo a esforzarse por capturar otra vez muchos peces en el ano siguiente, en que se celebrara el VII Congreso del PTC superando las dificultades de toda indole con el espiritu de viento cortante del Paektu bajo la direccion del Mariscal.
					
					En la ocasion hubo intervenciones.

articles.title: Embajador ruso ofrece banquete
articles.content:
Embajador ruso ofrece banquete
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Ano Nuevo 105 (2016) de la Era Juche, el embajador de la Federacion Rusa en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Alexandr Matsegora, ofrecio el dia 28 un banquete en su sede diplomatica. 
					Fueron invitados el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					Y estuvieron presentes los miembros de la embajada rusa en la RPDC.

articles.title: EE.UU. no puede ocultar su naturaleza bestial, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
EE.UU. no puede ocultar su naturaleza bestial, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El grupo de trabajo conjunto Sur de Corea-Estados Unidos publico el resultado de investigacion sobre el caso de introduccion de bacilos de antracosis de tropas norteamericanas en el suelo surcoreano. 
					Segun ello, desde 2009 hasta el ano pasado EE.UU. realizo en mas de 10 ocasiones en sus bases militares en Ryongsan y Osan las pruebas de bacilos de antracosis. 
					
					El hecho demuestra que este imperio de diablo pretende convertir la Peninsula Coreana no solo en la zona de contaminacion radiactiva sino tambien en el infierno de la guerra bacteriologica. 
					
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este lunes y continua:
					
					Ya fueron revelados en varias ocasiones los crimenes de EE.UU. tendentes a exterminar a la nacion coreana. 
					
					En el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el imperio cometio las matanzas no vistas infringiendo abiertamente la ley y normas internacionales y utilizando hasta las armas bacteriologicas y quimicas toxicas. E intento usar hasta las armas nucleares. 
					
					EE.UU. considera las armas bioquimicas como medio principal para exterminar a otros paises y naciones, y la guerra bioquimica, como una de las principales operaciones militares para dominar el mundo.
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que el imperio americano pretende justificar su ardid hablando de la supuesta "amenaza" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					La insistencia en la "amenaza de armas de exterminio masivo y de armas bioquimicas" no pasa de ser un pretexto para presionar a los Estados soberanos, ejercer la sancion internacional sobre ellos e inventar el motivo de invasion armada. 
					
					EE.UU. no puede ocultar con nada su asquerosa naturaleza como horda de gangsteres y bestias que amenaza la vida de la humanidad sin tener en cuenta la ley internacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de confrontacion fratricida de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela intencion de confrontacion fratricida de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 28 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Al referirse al proyecto de reunificacion basado en el sistema federal en un reciente seminario el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Hong Yong Phyo, dijo que "no puede aceptarlo", independientemente de que ese sistema fuera de la etapa baja o de la alta, porque es el "proyecto de reunificacion del Norte".  
					 Por otra parte, las autoridades surcoreanas hablan tanto de la supuesta gran cantidad de dinero efectivo y crean de manera astuta la opinion publica diciendo que "existen puntos dificiles para darle si o no" al problema de la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang a la vista de la "resolucion de sancion contra el Norte" de la ONU.
					
					  De esta manera, revelaron su sucia intencion ellas que han venido conduciendo a la opinion publica como si tuviera algun respeto a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido el dia 27 y prosigue:
					
					  Los disparates de Hong que rechazo abiertamente el segundo articulo que refleja concentradamente el espiritu principal  "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" de la declaracion arriba mencionada, significan la negacion a la misma declaracion.
					
					  Igualmente dan la respuesta clara a la posicion de la parte surena que no acepto la propuesta justa de la RPDC en las recien rotas conversaciones entre las autoridades Norte-Sur d Corea.
					
					  Este desafio de Hong al proyecto de la reunificacion del sistema federal parte de una ilusion de "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					  La naturaleza de las autoridades surcoreanas que persiguen persistentemente la politica conflictiva marchando a contrapelo de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur se aclara mas a traves de sus maniobras tendentes a evadir la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang.
					
					  Ahora, ellas difunden los rumores como si fuera punto principal la discusion sobre la correlatividad de la reanudacion del turismo al monte Kumgang y la "resolucion de la sancion sobre el Norte" de la ONU, lo cual deviene la expresion de la artimana para preparar el pretexto de negar el reinicio del turismo al monte Kumgang.
